content: For the first quarter of 2022, we reported a net loss of approximately $9.8 million or $0.05 net loss per share, compared to a net loss of approximately $21.6 million or $0.10 net loss per share for the first quarter of 2021. We also plan to invest in a multi-pronged manufacturing strategy to increase capacity, pre-clinically, we are working diligently to advance our membrane bound IL-15 towards an IND filing in the second half of 2023 as well as identify new proprietary TCRs using our hunTR discovery platform.
